n=0;

new graph 1 {0,0} ;
/*
0
	*/
n=1 ;
new graph 4 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3};
/*	
  1
0	3
  2
*/	
n=2	;
new graph 7 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6};
/*
  1   4
0   3   6
  2   5
*/
n=3;
new graph 10 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9};
/*
  1   4   7
0   3   6   9
  2   5   8
*/
n=4;
new graph 13 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12};
/*
  1   4   7   10
0   3   6   9   12
  2   5   8   11
*/
n=5;
new graph 16 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12} 
{12,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15};
/*
  1   4   7   10   13
0   3   6   9   12    15
  2   5   8   11   14
*/
